languages.text: [Незаметно пристегнуть руку Соломона к кровати его наручниками] "Я знаю, как отвлечь тебя от скверных мыслей".
[Smoothly cuff Solomorne's hand to the bed with his handcuffs] "I know how to distract you from dark thoughts."
languages.original_text: [Незаметно пристегнуть руку Соломона к кровати его наручниками] "Я знаю, как отвлечь тебя от скверных мыслей".

[Smoothly cuff Solomorne's hand to the bed with his handcuffs] "I know how to distract you from dark thoughts."

languages.text: [Attacher la main de Solomorne au lit avec ses menottes] « Je sais comment vous faire oublier ces sombres pensées. »
languages.original_text: [Smoothly cuff Solomorne's hand to the bed with his handcuffs] "I know how to distract you from dark thoughts."

traits.locale_text: [Attacher la main de Solomorne au lit avec ses menottes] « Je sais comment vous faire oublier ces sombres pensées. »

languages.text: [さりげなく手錠でソロモーンの手をベッドにつなぐ]「暗い考えなんか、忘れさせる方法を知ってるよ」
languages.original_text: [Smoothly cuff Solomorne's hand to the bed with his handcuffs] "I know how to distract you from dark thoughts."

traits.locale_text: [さりげなく手錠でソロモーンの手をベッドにつなぐ]「暗い考えなんか、忘れさせる方法を知ってるよ」

languages.text: [Atar rápidamente a Solomorne a la cama con sus propias esposas] «Se me ocurre algo para distraerle de esas ideas».
languages.original_text: [Smoothly cuff Solomorne's hand to the bed with his handcuffs] "I know how to distract you from dark thoughts."

traits.locale_text: [Atar rápidamente a Solomorne a la cama con sus propias esposas] «Se me ocurre algo para distraerle de esas ideas».

languages.text: [用手铐将索罗蒙的手铐在床上]“我知道怎么帮你从这些阴暗的思绪中挣脱出来。”
languages.original_text: [Smoothly cuff Solomorne's hand to the bed with his handcuffs] "I know how to distract you from dark thoughts."

traits.locale_text: [用手铐将索罗蒙的手铐在床上]“我知道怎么帮你从这些阴暗的思绪中挣脱出来。”

languages.text: [Solomorne'un elini kelepçeleriyle yatağa usulca kelepçele] "Dikkatini nasıl dağıtacağımı çok iyi biliyorum."
languages.original_text: [Smoothly cuff Solomorne's hand to the bed with his handcuffs] "I know how to distract you from dark thoughts."

traits.locale_text: [Solomorne'un elini kelepçeleriyle yatağa usulca kelepçele] "Dikkatini nasıl dağıtacağımı çok iyi biliyorum."

languages.text: [Solomornes Hand mit seinen Handschellen sanft an das Bett ketten] "Ich weiß, wie ich Euch von Euren düsteren Gedanken ablenken kann."
languages.original_text: [Smoothly cuff Solomorne's hand to the bed with his handcuffs] "I know how to distract you from dark thoughts."
